client.models

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.models.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGame

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGame
    The Game class will hold the map, a dice object, and the list of participants.
    Author:
    scottdaly
